sentences.en: Dr. Johnson and I have been trying to build him up physically.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊医生和我一直试图增强他的体质。

sentences.en: He was found desperately trying to untangle several reels of film.
sentences.cn: 他被撞见拼命想要解开几盘缠在一起的胶卷。

sentences.en: I got a message you were trying to reach me.
sentences.cn: 我收到一条留言，说你想跟我联系。

sentences.en: I'm a practicing physician trying to help people here and now.
sentences.cn: 我是一名此时此刻只想治病救人的执业医师。

sentences.en: I'm trying to move on and stretch myself with something different.
sentences.cn: 我正想换工作，想尝试点不一样的事情来挑战一下自己。

sentences.en: Sheila had an ulterior motive for trying to help Stan.
sentences.cn: 希拉想帮助斯坦是另有所图的。

sentences.en: Stewart was trying to clear a path for the stretcher.
sentences.cn: 斯图尔特在努力给担架开路。

sentences.en: The barriers are lethal to fish trying to swim upstream.
sentences.cn: 这些障碍物对于想要往上游游动的鱼儿来说是致命的。

sentences.en: The beginning of the show is often a trying time because of latecomers.
sentences.cn: 演出刚开始常常是最难熬的时期，因为总会有人迟到。

sentences.en: The big factories are trying to stay alive by cutting costs.
sentences.cn: 大型工厂正试图通过削减成本以维持生存。

sentences.en: The shark was writhing around wildly, trying to get free.
sentences.cn: 鲨鱼拼命挣扎，试图逃脱。

sentences.en: They are now trying to compete on an equal footing.
sentences.cn: 他们现在想要公平竞争。

sentences.en: They do the best they can in trying circumstances .
sentences.cn: 他们在艰难的环境下尽自己最大的努力。

sentences.en: They're trying their best to bring together those separated families.
sentences.cn: 他们正尽最大的努力让离散的家人重聚。

sentences.en: We're trying to establish linkages between these groups and financial institutions.
sentences.cn: 我们正努力在这些团体和金融机构之间建立联系。

sentences.en: Well, parenthetically, I was trying to quit smoking at the time.
sentences.cn: 嗯，插一句，我那时正在努力戒烟。

sentences.en: Yasin had seriously hurt himself while trying to escape from the police.
sentences.cn: 亚辛试图从警察手中逃脱时受了重伤。

words.tran_cn: 试图，努力；试验；审判；考验

trans.tran_cn: 令人难于忍受的，难堪的，令人厌烦的
trans.tran_en: annoying or difficult in a way that makes you feel worried, tired etc

trans.tran_cn: 试图( try的现在分词)，试验，尝试，审讯
